ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/reactDetox.xcworkspace -scheme reactDetox -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO -quiet

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/reactDetox.xcworkspace -scheme reactDetox -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO -quiet
